I love it.
If eBay doesn't respond I can outbid you all
near the end of the sale and either:
1. Retract my bid explaining the fraud causing
the house of cards to come tumbling down.
2. "Win" the auction, get wire funds transfer
from the "seller", and report him to the authorities.

Ideas?

Cary Condell
